column2: IOWA DMV DRIVING TEST
Question Text
1. Which shape is a speed limit sign?
2. A crosswalk is:
column4: an area designated for blind persons.
column8: the area where pedestrians may cross the road.

column2: 3. At a light rail intersection, you should always:
column4: be alert and obey all traffic signals.
column6: share the road with pedestrians and bicyclists.
column8: look both ways before crossing the tracks.

column2: 4. When an aggressive driver confronts you, you should:
column8: Report aggressive drivers to law enforcement authorities.

column2: 5. The traffic light is green and you want to drive straight through an intersection. If a car is already in the intersection and is making a turn, you must:
column4: enter the intersection and then stop.
column6: let that car complete its turn before you enter the intersection.
column8: drive through the intersection. You have the right-of-way.
column10: wait for the next green light.

column2: 6. This sign means:
7. Drivers must yield for emergency vehicles:
column4: when they see a flashing red or blue light or hear a siren.

column2: 8. This road sign means:
column6: A road joins from the right

column2: 9. When approaching any intersection or driveway, drivers should:
column4: drive at the fastest speed just before entering the intersection.
column6: look both ways and be ready to stop.
column10: pass other vehicles and then stop.

column2: 10. If you become sleepy while driving you should:
column4: get some rest or change drivers.

column2: 11. You reach an intersection that is not controlled at the same time as a driver on your right, and both of you prepare to go straight. Who has the right-of-way?
12. When driving in fog, drivers should:
column4: use low beam headlights to better illuminate the road ahead.

column2: 13. What is the meaning of blue traffic signs?
column8: Blue indicates pedestrian crossings and school zones.
column10: A blue background indicates a regulatory sign.

column2: 14. Gauging the speed of a motorcycle may be difficult because:
column4: motorcycles often slow down by downshifting.
column6: many motorcyclists do not activate the brake light.
column10: motorcycles take up less of your field of vision.

column2: 15. The use of alcohol and/or drugs affects:
16. If another car is in danger of hitting you, you should:
17. This road sign means:
column4: Traffic is entering from another road, drive with caution

column2: 18. It's 10 AM. This sign tells you that:
column4: you are not allowed to park here.
column6: you must park your car between 8:30 AM and 5:30 PM.
column8: you are allowed to park until 5:30 PM.
column10: you must display a special permit in order to park here.

column2: 19. This road sign means:
column4: You must bear either right or left
column6: A road joins from the left
column10: The roadway you are traveling on ends ahead

column2: 20. This road sign means:
21. When driving at night with no other vehicles ahead, a driver should use:
22. You must pull over to the edge of the road and allow an emergency vehicle to pass:
column4: only if the emergency vehicle is approaching.
column6: only if the emergency vehicle is following you.

column2: 23. When the road is slippery you should:
24. What is the purpose of minimum speed limits?
column4: To allow emergency vehicles with red flashing lights to safely pass other vehicles.
column6: To decrease the state average speed statistic.
column8: To keep a smooth traffic flow.

column2: 25. What should you do in case of a brake failure?
column6: Rub your tires on the curb to slow your car.
column8: Pull off the road into an open space, if available.

column2: 26. This road sign means:
27. What does a flashing red light mean?
column6: The same thing as a stop sign.
column10: Drivers may move forward with caution.

column2: 28. When two cars arrive at an intersection with no signs or signals at the same time, which car has the right-of-way?
column4: The car in which the driver sounds the horn.
column6: The car approaching from the left.
column8: The car approaching from the right.
column10: The car that is traveling faster.

column2: 29. When driving in bad weather, drivers should:
column8: increase their speed to get to their destination more quickly.

column2: 30. Parking is not allowed:
column4: on the road side of a parked vehicle.

column2: 31. This road sign means:
column4: Drivers may proceed if the way is clear
column8: Drivers are about to enter a one way street the wrong way

column2: 32. A steady yellow light means that a ______ light will soon appear.
33. This road sign tells drivers that:
column6: they must turn either to the right or left.
column8: the one-way street or roadway ahead ends.

column2: 34. You may not pass another vehicle on either side of a _______ centerline.
35. When children are close, what should you do before you back out of a driveway?
column4: Get out of the car and check behind the car.
column8: Look through your back window for children.
